<xs:complexType name="serviceStatus"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="statusCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="NonEmptyString"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:pattern value="[\s\S]*[^ ][\s\S]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType id="PositiveInteger" name="PositiveInteger"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ValidateEmail"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://oc.com/projet3/bibliows/anonymous" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://oc.com/projet3/bibliows/anonymous" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://oc.com/projet3/bibliows/anonymous"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://oc.com/projet3/bibliows/anonymous" jxb:version="2.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jxb="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb"> <!--ACCOUNT--> <xs:element name="authenticationRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="authenticationResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="createAccountRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="email" type="tns:fctValidateEmail"/> <xs:element name="firstname" type="tns:fctNonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="lastname" type="tns:fctNonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="password" type="tns:fctValidatePassword"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="createAccountResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="email" type="tns:fctValidateEmail"/> <xs:element name="firstname" type="tns:fctNonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="lastname" type="tns:fctNonEmptyString"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="accountWS"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="firstname" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="lastname" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="fctNonEmptyString"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:pattern value="[\s\S]*[^ ][\s\S]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType id="PositiveInteger" name="fctPositiveInteger"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="fctValidateEmail"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9_]+([-+.'][A-Za-z0-9_]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9_]+([-.][A-Za-z0-9_]+)*\.[A-Za-z0-9_]+([-.][A-Za-z0-9_]+)*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="fctValidatePassword"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="5"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="authenticationRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:authenticationRequest" name="authenticationRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="authenticationResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:authenticationResponse" name="authenticationResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createAccountResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createAccountResponse" name="createAccountResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createAccountRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createAccountRequest" name="createAccountRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="anonymousPort"> <wsdl:operation name="authentication"> <wsdl:input message="tns:authenticationRequest" name="authenticationRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:authenticationResponse" name="authenticationResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createAccount"> <wsdl:input message="tns:createAccountRequest" name="createAccountRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:createAccountResponse" name="createAccountResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="anonymousPortSoap11" type="tns:anonymousPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="authentication"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="authenticationRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="authenticationResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createAccount"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="createAccountRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="createAccountResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="anonymousPortService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:anonymousPortSoap11" name="anonymousPortSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/anonymous"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
